text: Ixora umbellata is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is found from southern Indo-China to western Malaysia. ==Sources== * Florence, J. 1998. Ixora umbellata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. ==External links== *World Checklist of Rubiaceae umbellata Category:Flora of French Polynesia Category:Data deficient plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Ixora umbellata
